Utility Function to Search Aliases Across Icon Libraries

Source: R/font.R
search_aliases.Rd

A generic function to search for aliases within specified icon libraries.

Usage

search_aliases(
  str = "",
  dataset = c("FontAwesome", "Bootstrap"),
  type = "solid",
  approximate = FALSE
)

Arguments

str

A character string alias to search the specified icon library. If left empty (default ""), it returns all available aliases.

dataset

A character string specifying the icon library to search. Supported values are "FontAwesome" and "Bootstrap". Default is "FontAwesome".

type

For FontAwesome dataset only. Specifies the subset to search within. One of "solid", "regular", or "brands". Ignored for other datasets. Default is "solid".

approximate

Logical. If TRUE, performs approximate matching using agrep. If FALSE (default), performs exact matching using grep.

Value

A sorted character vector of matching aliases.

On this page
